languages.text: "Прошу прощения, но после слов про разорение склепа и ту мерзость, что он{mf||а} совершил{mf||а}, я просто обязана прикончить эт{mf|ого|у} {mf|ублюдка|суку}".
"Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
languages.original_text: "Прошу прощения, но после слов про разорение склепа и ту мерзость, что он{mf||а} совершил{mf||а}, я просто обязана прикончить эт{mf|ого|у} {mf|ублюдка|суку}".

traits.locale_text: "I beg your pardon, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I beg your pardon, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I beg your pardon, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I beg your pardon, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Navrée, mais sachant qu'{mf|il|elle} a détruit la crypte et commis des actes abominables, je suis obligée d'abattre cette ordure. »
languages.original_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: « Navrée, mais sachant qu'{mf|il|elle} a détruit la crypte et commis des choses abominables, je suis obligée d'abattre cette ordure. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Lo siento, pero, después de escuchar lo de la destrucción de la cripta y la atrocidad que ha hecho, tengo que pegarle un tiro a es{mf|e hijo de puta|a hija de puta}».
languages.original_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: «Con el debido respeto, después de escuchar lo de la destrucción de la cripta y la atrocidad que ha hecho, tengo que pegarle un tiro a es{mf|e hijo de puta|a hija de puta}».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “抱歉，但{mf|他|她}说她摧毁了墓穴，还犯下了如此卑鄙的恶行。我觉得，我一定得宰了那个{mf|臭杂种|臭婊子}不可。”
languages.original_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: “请原谅，但{mf|他|她}说她摧毁了墓穴，还犯下了如此卑鄙的恶行。我觉得，我一定得宰了那个{mf|臭杂种|臭婊子}不可。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「悪いわね。だけど、墓所の破壊とあいつの卑劣な行為を聞いてしまったからには、あのバカを撃たざるを得ないの」
languages.original_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: 「悪いわね。だけど、墓所の破壊とあいつの卑劣な行為を聞いてしまったからには、あのバカを撃たざるを得ないの」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, doch nachdem ich von der Zerstörung der Krypta gehört habe und weiß, was {mf|er|sie} Grauenhaftes getan hat, muss ich {mf|dieses Arschloch|diese Hure} einfach erschießen."
languages.original_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, doch nachdem ich von der Zerstörung der Krypta gehört habe und weiß, was {mf|er|sie} Grauenhaftes getan hat, muss ich {mf|dieses Arschloch|diese Hure} einfach erschießen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Üzgünüm ama mahzenin yıkıldığını ve yaptığı aşağılık şeyi duyduktan sonra bu pisliği vurmak zorundayım."
languages.original_text: "Sorry, but after hearing about the destruction of the crypt and the despicable thing {mf|he|she} did, I just have to shoot that {mf|bastard|bitch}."
